messages.caption: Samantha
messages.firstItem:
Hey there!
My dear fellow, my name's Santa - same as one man's from the North Pole which is on that Blue planet. Take this hat not to catch a cold at this snowed up location.
messages.questTask: Hey there! I'm Samantha! I love music so much! Who doesn't?? Hehe! But I need your help! A miute ago, I was playing one of my favorite songs on my new guitar! I went to get some water, and a group of Nichos ran by and stole some of my guitar equipment! I have no idea where my guitar picks are! Can you please help me find them? If you do find all three guitar picks, I'll give you a cool prize.
messages.noItem: Dude, the picks won't find themselves. Go go go! My concert starts in 15 minutes.
messages.nextItem: Thanks so much for finding a pick! Now do you think you can find the others...? I'm being as patient as I can!
messages.questComplete: Wow, you managed to find all my picks! I'm so thankful... but next time try being faster!! Anyway, take this present.
messages.idleMessage: Thank you for your help, but I've got to rehearse for my concert!
